short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A web extension that lets you save and reuse your favorite prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create and save your best Superprompts. 

The extension includes a popup window that displays the list of saved superprompts, along with the ability to add new prompts, expand or reduce the prompt content, and delete existing prompts. The prompts are stored using Chrome's sync storage API, allowing users to access their prompts across different devices.

Overall, the extension provides a simple and convenient way for users to create and manage a list of prompts.

Made with ChatGPT

By The AI Explorer @AIWondersLV
